user.title: Gemini Live
user.description: Enter your Google AI API key to connect to the Gemini Live API.

data_description.api_key: Your Google AI API key from https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey

data_description.model: The Gemini model to use for live conversations
data_description.voice: The voice to use for audio responses
data_description.instructions: System instructions for the AI assistant
data_description.enable_personalization: When enabled, the service may use conversation content to personalize responses. Disabled by default for privacy.
data_description.enable_google_search: Allow the AI to search the web using Google Search

mcp_menu.title: MCP Servers
mcp_menu.description: Configure Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for extended tool capabilities.

mcp_add_sse.title: Add SSE MCP Server
mcp_add_sse.description: Add a Server-Sent Events MCP server.

data_description.name: A unique name for this server
data_description.url: The URL of the SSE MCP server

mcp_add_stdio.title: Add Stdio MCP Server
mcp_add_stdio.description: Add a stdio MCP server that runs as a subprocess.

data_description.name: A unique name for this server
data_description.command: The command to run (e.g., npx, uvx)

personalization_confirm.title: Personalization - Confirm
personalization_confirm.description: Enabling personalization may send additional conversation data to the external service to improve and personalize responses. Only enable if you accept the potential data handling implications.

data.confirm_personalization: I understand and accept the privacy implications

send_message.name: Send Message
send_message.description: Send a text message to the Gemini Live API.

send_audio.name: Send Audio
send_audio.description: Send audio data to the Gemini Live API.

connect_mcp_servers.name: Connect MCP Servers
connect_mcp_servers.description: Connect to all configured MCP servers.
